Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: not tested recording has no tracks
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Correct response: no recordings
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response. There was no recordings on the DUT.

Test.Name: Correct response: recorings amaunt is equal to max
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: created recording has no Video track
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: created recording has no Audio track
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: created recording has no Metadata track
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response: created recording has no tracks
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Incorrect response:created recording is not returned
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: DUT did not return Recording with RecordingToken=RecordingToken1 in GetRecordingsResponse message after recording creation

Test.Name: Incorrect response: deleted recording is returned
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The DUT returned Recording with RecordingToken=RecordingToken1 in GetRecordingsResponse message after recording deletion

Test.Name: SourceId parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The SourceId parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Name parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Name parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Location parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Location parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Description parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Description parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Address parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Address parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Content parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The Content parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: MaximumRetentionTime parameter in created recording is differ
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: The MaximumRetentionTime parameter value of recording (RecordingToken=RecordingToken1) in updated recordings list differ from value in CreateRecordingRequest message

Test.Name: Not unique Recording token
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: DUT returned RecordingToken value in the CreateRecordingResponse not unique with Recording Tokens in initial GetRecordingsResponse message

Test.Name: No old recording after recording creation
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Recording from initial list is not presented in GetRecordings response after recording cration

Test.Name: No old recording after recording deletion (one old recording)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Recording from initial list is not presented in GetRecordings response after recording deletion

Test.Name: No old recording after recording deletion (some old recording)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Recording from initial list is not presented in GetRecordings response after recording deletion

Test.Name: Recording list is changed after recording creation (superfluous recording)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: recording list contains superfluous recording after recording creation

Test.Name: Recording list is changed after recording deletion (superfluous recording)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: recording list contains superfluous recording after recording deletion

Test.Name: SourceId parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: SourceId parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation

Test.Name: SourceId parameter in old recording is changed (after deletion)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: SourceId parameter in old recording is changed after recording's deletion

Test.Name: Name parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Name parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation

Test.Name: Name parameter in old recording is changed (after deletion)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Name parameter in old recording is changed after recording's deletion

Test.Name: Location parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Location parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation

Test.Name: Location parameter in old recording is changed (after deletion)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Location parameter in old recording is changed after recording's deletion

Test.Name: Description parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Description parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation

Test.Name: Description parameter in old recording is changed (after deletion)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Description parameter in old recording is changed after recording's deletion

Test.Name: Address parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Address parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation

Test.Name: Address parameter in old recording is changed (after deletion)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Address parameter in old recording is changed after recording's deletion

Test.Name: Content parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Content parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation

Test.Name: Content parameter in old recording is changed (after deletion)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: Content parameter in old recording is changed after recording's deletion

Test.Name: MaximumRetentionTime parameter in old recording is changed (after creation)
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC RECORDING CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends incorrect response: MaximumRetentionTime parameter in old recording is changed after recording's creation
